verbose_text: This is because a constitutively active Ras, which cannot be deactivated by Ras-GAP, is always able to activate Raf-1 and B-Raf which results in the constitutive activation of MEK and subsequently ERK to high levels.
evidence: Ras, which cannot be deactivated by Ras-GAP, is always able to activate Raf-1 and B-Raf
